short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple task management extension for productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple to do list extension, which allows you to add all the tasks you may want to do. 
Once a task is complete, you can just click on the task and a tick will be placed beside the task.
By using this extension, we hope you can make use of your time efficiently and plan out your days work allowing you to be productive. 
Do provide your feedback on the extension. The extension will be updated regularly. Cheers!

*Updates*
1) Dark Mode Option:
-Option to switch between Light Mode and Dark Mode. This feature was not available in the previous version.

2) Individual Task Deletion:
-Delete tasks individually by holding down the "Shift" key and clicking on a specific task. 
In Version 1.0, the only option was to delete all tasks at once, and individual task deletion was not available.

3) RGB Outline:
-Features an RGB outline that adds a vibrant touch to the popup, making it more visually appealing.
